Description_lang: Increase the range of your Lightning Bolt spell by $s1 yds.

description_blz.en_US: Increase the range of your Lightning Bolt spell by 5 yds.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta el alcance de tu hechizo Descarga de relámpagos 5 m.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 5 m o alcance do seu feitiço Raio.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht den Radius Eures Zaubers 'Blitzschlag' um 5 Meter.
description_blz.en_GB: Increase the range of your Lightning Bolt spell by 5 yds.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta el alcance de tu hechizo Descarga de relámpagos 5 m.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente la portée de votre sort Éclair de 5 mètres.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la portata di Dardo Fulminante di 5 m.
description_blz.ru_RU: Увеличивает дальность действия заклинания "Молния" на 5 м.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你閃電箭的射程延長5碼。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你的闪电箭的射程提高5码。
